results.title: Livedo reticularis caused by cholesterol embolization may improve with simvastatin.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Livedo_Reticularis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054068 @@@Livedo reticularis@@@ caused by @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ embolization may improve with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Finch TM, Ryatt KS. Livedo reticularis caused by cholesterol embolization may improve with simvastatin. Br J Dermatol. 2000 Dec;143(6):1319-20. PMID: 11122043
citations.BibTeX: @article{11122043, title={Livedo reticularis caused by cholesterol embolization may improve with simvastatin.}, author={Finch TM and Ryatt KS}, journal={Br J Dermatol}, volume={143}, number={6}, pages={1319-20}}

results.title: Potential therapeutic effect of simvastatin on progressive renal failure and nephrotic-range proteinuria caused by renal cholesterol embolism.
results.text_hl: Progressive @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@ and @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic@@@-range @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ were halted just after treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can exert a beneficial therapeutic effect on @DISEASE_Embolism_Cholesterol @DISEASE_MESH:D017700 @@@renal cholesterol embolism@@@.

citations.NLM: Yonemura K, Ikegaya N, Fujigaki Y, Suzuki H, Togawa A, Hishida A. Potential therapeutic effect of simvastatin on progressive renal failure and nephrotic-range proteinuria caused by renal cholesterol embolism. Am J Med Sci. 2001 Jul;322(1):50-2. PMID: 11465248
citations.BibTeX: @article{11465248, title={Potential therapeutic effect of simvastatin on progressive renal failure and nephrotic-range proteinuria caused by renal cholesterol embolism.}, author={Yonemura K and Ikegaya N and Fujigaki Y and Suzuki H and Togawa A and Hishida A}, journal={Am J Med Sci}, volume={322}, number={1}, pages={50-2}}
